name: Naakka
description:
A short game about a jackdaw collecting sticks, finished in November 2017 as part of Programming 1 course of the University of Jyväskylä.  Made using C# and Jypeli.

Move with arrows and space, you can jump infinitely. Collect worms from the ground to increase health, avoid other birds. Find all the sticks. Quit with Esc.
